entries.megan_drlar_q2_needed: A rare hyperdrive part from the Death Star.
entries.lian_byrne_q3_needed: The notes of a Rebel intelligence operative concerning the Imperial salvage operation on Yavin 4.
entries.lian_byrne_q1_needed: A report summarizing the current information acquired from the abandoned Rebel base on Yavin 4.
entries.jazeen_thurmm_q1_needed: Briefcase containing survey tool repair parts
entries.ruwan_tokai_q2_needed: Retroactive permission, granted by an Imperial officer to Imperial Technical Sergeant Ruwan Tokai, to study a Death Star fragment that turned out to be highly classified.
entries.ruwan_tokai_q1_needed: An unidentifiable chunk of durasteel, possibly a hull fragment, from the destroyed Imperial battle station.
entries.gins_darone_q2_needed: Standard-issue Czerka Vibroknuckler owned by a Rebel Alliance Special Forces sergeant on Yavin 4.
entries.gins_darone_q1_needed: Standard-issue BlasTech DH-17 blaster pistol owned by a Rebel Alliance officer stranded on Yavin 4.
entries.yith_seenath_q1_needed: Encrypted orders from Imperial High Command.
